mapper.select: select sno, sname, sage, gender, grade, sphone, intro, status, smail from student;
select sno, sname, sage, gender, grade, sphone, intro, status, smail from student where sno = #{sno}
mapper.update: update student set student.sname = #{student.sname}, student.sage = #{student.sage}, student.gender = #{student.gender}, student.sphone = #{student.sphone}, student.intro = #{student.intro}, student.smail = #{student.smail} where student.sno = #{student.sno};
